info.name: Madoka Bow and Arrow Cursor
info.description: Puella Magi Madoka Magica themed cursor for your internet browser!

style.css: /* Start http://www.cursors-4u.com */ body, a:hover {cursor: url(http://www.cursor.cc/cursor/704/9/cursor.png), progress !important;} /* End http://www.cursors-4u.com */
